name: 遗落迷途lost in tomorrow
description:
This is a original point-and-click puzzle solving game.

The protagonist is an early AI robot sent to explore outer planets many years ago. When it returns to the earth after completing its mission, the earth at this time has changed into Intellectual crisis. You, the robot, have to start an apocalyptic adventure to save mankind.

This is the first game I designed with passion. I set up a company (Later, I found that there was no need to use the company to upload games). I love this game like my child, Although it has many shortcomings(lack of time and money). What I only have is strength and love of Games.:

Thank you for your willingness to play this game and your tolerance for it, and don't hide your opinions and suggestions, which I need.
